toolsOffer: Here are the tools we offer
hackDataContent: Our developer portal has all the tools and data you need in order to create new solutions and services. This portal has been built from the point of view of a developer in order to create the best possible DX.
ruleDataContent: My world is a visualisation tool where you can manage your data in a digital twin, see where it comes from and where it links to.
sellAndBuyContent: Make your data earn. We are creating a marketplace for data products and applications where you can offer your data for others to utilise or a ready-made service or application for others to buy. You define the pricing, we take care of contracts and licensing. Automatically.
partnersHeaderText: Here are some of our partners and first users
author: Author
sharePiece: Come on, share this piece. You know you want to.
comeMeetUsText: Come meet us at following events
noUpcomingEventsText: No upcoming events for now. Sign up for news to receive events info and follow us
aboutText1: Communally built Platform of Trust is a platform that makes data move between systems and organisations. It makes knowledge-based decisions possible but also creates grounds for new business models with harmonised data.
aboutText2: Platform of Trust differs from other platforms with a built-in trust engine that makes sure both the data producers and data users are trustworthy
aboutText3: Any business that is using or planning to use data for business development and new business models.
aboutText4: Developers that long for faster time-to-market and want to experience high-quality developer experience.
aboutVideoText: Platform of Trust benefits in one minute by CEO Toni Luhti
aboutPartText: Platform of Trust is part of
contactHeader: Interested in turning your data in revenue? Let us tell you how.
